summary: This is an internal email from August 26, 2019, regarding logistical assistance for a hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for the following day. It mentions the Southern District of New York (SDNY) requesting agent support for victim assistance and press management, with an expectation of at least 20 victims attending.

persons.name: Mill
persons.context: Mentioned as having an early morning search, implying they are a law enforcement agent or staff member involved in the case.

persons.name: Letlew
persons.context: Addressed in the email to confirm availability for assisting with the hearing.

events.title: Epstein Case Hearing
events.description: A hearing regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case scheduled for 10:30 AM, with at least 20 victims expected to attend.

keyFacts: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for August 27, 2019, at 10:30 AM.
The Southern District of New York (SDNY) requested assistance from agents to help manage victims and avoid press at the hearing.
At least 20 victims were expected to attend the hearing, with upwards of 30 anticipated.
